docs.title: Welcome to My Attend
docs.text:
Track employee attendance effortlessly with My Attend!

My Attend is a powerful, user-friendly mobile app designed to streamline employee attendance management for businesses of all sizes. Whether you're a small team or a large organization, My Attend helps you track work hours, manage check-ins and check-outs, and generate comprehensive reports with ease.

docs.title: Our Mission
docs.text:
Making attendance tracking simple, accurate, and stress-free for everyone.

We believe that tracking employee attendance shouldn't be complicated, time-consuming, or prone to errors. My Attend was created to eliminate the frustrations of traditional time-tracking methods while providing businesses with the insights they need to manage their workforce effectively.

docs.title: The Problem We Solve
docs.text:
Traditional attendance tracking methods create problems for everyone:

For Employees: - Forgotten punch cards and time sheets - Disputes over recorded hours - Complicated systems that waste time - Lack of visibility into their own attendance data

For Managers: - Manual data entry and calculations - Time theft and buddy punching - Difficulty generating accurate reports - Compliance challenges with labor laws

For Businesses: - Payroll errors and disputes - Administrative overhead - Lack of real-time workforce visibility - Integration challenges with existing systems

docs.title: Adding New Employees
docs.text:
Bring new team members into the system:

  1. Navigate to Employees section
  2. Click "Add Employee" button
  3. Fill in employee details:
  4. Full name and contact information
  5. Employee ID (auto-generated or custom)
  6. Job title and department
  7. Start date and employment type
  8. Work schedule assignment
  9. Set permissions and role level
  10. Send invitation via email or provide login credentials
  11. Employee receives setup instructions

docs.text:

Status Actions: - Deactivate accounts when employees leave - Reactivate accounts for returning employees - Suspend access for disciplinary reasons - Transfer between departments or locations

docs.text:

docs.title: Manual Time Adjustments
docs.text:
Correct attendance records when needed:

When to Use: - Employee forgot to check in/out - System glitches or technical issues - Legitimate work performed outside normal check-in process - Approved overtime or early departures

Adjustment Process: 1. Find the employee in the attendance records 2. Select the date that needs correction 3. Choose adjustment type: - Add missing check-in - Add missing check-out - Modify existing times - Add break periods 4. Enter correct times and add notes explaining the change 5. Save adjustment - employee is notified of the change

docs.text:

Alert Types: - Late arrivals - Employees checking in after scheduled time - Early departures - Leaving before scheduled end time - Missing check-outs - Forgot to clock out at end of day - Excessive breaks - Break time exceeding policy limits - Location violations - Check-ins from unauthorized locations

Alert Management: - Set alert thresholds for different violation types - Choose notification methods (email, in-app, SMS) - Assign alert recipients - who gets notified about what - Create escalation rules for repeated violations

docs.title: Approval Workflow
docs.text: Efficiently handle employee time-off requests:

docs.title: Reviewing Requests
docs.text:
1. Access Approvals section from admin dashboard
  2. See pending requests with employee details
  3. Review request information:
  4. Employee name and department
  5. Requested dates and duration
  6. Leave type (vacation, sick, personal)
  7. Employee's note or reason
  8. Current leave balance
  9. Check team coverage for requested dates
  10. Make approval decision

docs.title: Approval Actions
docs.text:
• Approve - Grant the time off request
  • Deny - Reject with reason for denial
  • Partial approval - Approve some but not all requested days
  • Request more info - Ask employee for additional details
  • Defer decision - Mark for later review

docs.title: Common Admin Issues
docs.text:
Employee can't check in: - Verify employee is active and has proper permissions - Check location settings and GPS accuracy - Confirm employee is using correct login credentials - Review any active restrictions or suspensions

Reports showing incorrect data: - Check date ranges and filters applied - Verify employee assignments to correct departments/locations - Review any manual time adjustments that might affect totals - Ensure all employees have completed their check-out process

Leave requests not appearing: - Confirm employees are submitting to correct approval chain - Check spam folders for approval notification emails - Verify leave policy settings allow requests for those dates - Review employee leave balances and eligibility

docs.title: 🐛 Reporting Bugs
docs.text: Found a bug? Help us fix it by providing detailed information.

docs.title: Before Reporting a Bug
docs.text:
1. Check if it's already reported - Search existing issues first
  2. Try basic troubleshooting - Restart the app, check for updates
  3. Reproduce the issue - Make sure it happens consistently
  4. Gather information - Screenshots, device details, steps to reproduce

docs.title: How to Report Bugs
docs.text:
Email Method: Send detailed bug reports to bugs@myattend.com

In-App Method: 1. Go to Profile > Help & Support 2. Tap "Report a Bug" 3. Fill out the bug report form 4. Submit with screenshots if applicable

docs.title: What to Include in Bug Reports
docs.text:
Required Information: - App version (found in Profile > About) - Device information (iPhone 12, Samsung Galaxy S21, etc.) - Operating system version (iOS 15.2, Android 12, etc.) - Steps to reproduce the bug - Expected behavior vs. actual behavior - Screenshots or videos if helpful

Example Bug Report: 

Subject: Check-in button not responding on Android

App Version: 1.2.1
Device: Samsung Galaxy S22
OS: Android 13
Organization: ABC Company

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open My Attend app
2. Tap the "Check In" button
3. Button appears pressed but nothing happens
4. No check-in is recorded

Expected: Check-in should be recorded with timestamp
Actual: Button press has no effect

Additional info: This started happening after the latest app update.
Happens every time I try to check in.

Example Feature Request: 

Subject: Bulk check-in for team events

Description: 
Add ability for managers to check in multiple employees at once 
for team events, meetings, or training sessions.

Use Case:
When our team has off-site training, it's tedious for everyone 
to individually check in. A bulk check-in would save time and 
ensure everyone's attendance is recorded.

Target Users:
Managers and team leads who organize group activities

Priority: Medium
Currently we manually adjust attendance records after events.

Suggested Implementation:
- "Bulk Check-in" option in admin panel
- Select multiple employees from list
- Set common check-in time
- Add notes about the event

docs.title: Quick Check-in Process
docs.text: Start your workday with a simple tap:

docs.title: Step-by-Step Check-in
docs.text:
1. Open My Attend when you arrive at work
  2. Tap the large "Check In" button on your home screen
  3. Confirm your location if prompted (GPS verification)
  4. See confirmation message with your check-in time
  5. Your status updates to "Checked In" with a green indicator

docs.title: What Happens When You Check In
docs.text:
• Precise timestamp recorded to the second
  • Location verified (if enabled by your organization)
  • Daily timer starts tracking your work hours
  • Notification sent to supervisors (if configured)
  • Dashboard updates to show current status

docs.title: Quick Check-out Process
docs.text: End your workday just as easily:

docs.title: Step-by-Step Check-out
docs.text:
1. Open My Attend when you're ready to leave
  2. Tap the "Check Out" button (now prominently displayed)
  3. Review your day's summary if shown
  4. Confirm the check-out action
  5. See your total hours worked for the day

docs.title: Check-out Summary

docs.title: Break Management

docs.title: Starting a Break
docs.text:

  2. Select break type (lunch, coffee, personal)
  3. Confirm break start - timer pauses work hours
  4. Your status shows "On Break" with yellow indicator

docs.title: Ending a Break
docs.text:
1. Tap "End Break" when you return to work
  2. Confirm break end - work timer resumes
  3. Break duration automatically calculated
  4. Status returns to "Checked In"

Break Types: - Lunch Break - Meal periods (usually unpaid) - Coffee Break - Short breaks (usually paid) - Personal Break - Personal time as needed - Custom Breaks - Organization-specific break types

docs.title: Today's Summary

docs.title: Weekly Overview

docs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
docs.text: Find quick answers to the most common questions about My Attend. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

docs.title: How do I download and install My Attend?
docs.text:
My Attend is available on both iOS and Android:

  • iOS: Download from the App Store by searching "My Attend"
  • Android: Download from Google Play Store by searching "My Attend"
  • System Requirements: iOS 15+ or Android 8.0+

For detailed installation instructions, see our Installation Guide.

docs.title: How do I create an account?
docs.text:
There are two ways to get started:

  1. Join existing organization: Get an organization code from your admin and use "Join Organization" option
  2. Create new organization: Use "Create Organization" if you're setting up My Attend for your company

docs.title: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
docs.text:
1. Tap "Forgot Password?" on the login screen
  2. Enter your email address
  3. Check your email for reset instructions
  4. Follow the link to create a new password
  5. Log in with your new password

If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder or contact support.

docs.title: Can I use My Attend on multiple devices?
docs.text: Yes! Your account syncs across all your devices. Simply log in with the same credentials on each device. Your attendance data will be automatically synchronized.

docs.title: How do I check in and out?
docs.text:
Check-in: 1. Open My Attend when you arrive at work 2. Tap the large "Check In" button 3. Confirm your location if prompted 4. See confirmation of your check-in time

Check-out: 1. Open My Attend when leaving work 2. Tap the "Check Out" button 3. Review your day's summary 4. Confirm the check-out

docs.title: What if I forget to check in or out?
docs.text:
Don't worry! Contact your supervisor or admin immediately:

  • Provide the correct times you actually started/ended work
  • Explain the circumstances (forgot phone, app issues, etc.)
  • Your admin can add manual entries to correct your attendance

docs.title: Why does the app ask for my location?
docs.text:
Location verification ensures you're checking in from your designated work location. This helps prevent:

  • Remote check-ins when you should be on-site
  • Buddy punching (someone else checking you in)
  • Accurate location tracking for multi-site businesses

Your location is only checked during check-in/out, not continuously tracked.

docs.title: Can I check in without internet?
docs.text:
Yes! My Attend works offline:

  • Check-in/out offline - Actions are saved locally
  • Automatic sync - Data uploads when internet returns
  • No data loss - Everything is preserved safely

docs.title: How do I request time off?
docs.text:
1. Go to Schedule section in the app
  2. Tap "Request Leave"
  3. Select your dates and leave type
  4. Add a note explaining your request (optional)
  5. Submit for approval
  6. Get notified when approved or denied

docs.title: How long does leave approval take?
docs.text:
Approval times depend on your organization's policy:

  • Typical response: 24-48 hours for most requests
  • Urgent requests: Contact your manager directly
  • Advance notice: Submit requests as early as possible
  • Blackout periods: Some dates may have restrictions

docs.title: How do I check my leave balance?
docs.text:
1. Go to Profile section
  2. Tap "Leave Balance" or check your dashboard
  3. See current balances for different leave types:
  4. Vacation days
  5. Sick leave
  6. Personal days
  7. Other leave types

docs.title: Can I cancel a leave request?
docs.text:
Yes, if it hasn't been approved yet:

  1. Go to Schedule > Leave Requests
  2. Find your pending request
  3. Tap "Cancel Request"
  4. Confirm cancellation

For approved requests, contact your manager to discuss changes.

docs.title: The app won't let me check in. What's wrong?
docs.text:
Common causes and solutions:

Location issues: - Ensure GPS/location services are enabled - Make sure you're within the allowed check-in area - Try moving closer to your work location

App issues: - Force close and reopen the app - Check for app updates in your app store - Restart your device

Account issues: - Verify you're logged in with correct credentials - Check if your account is active (contact admin) - Ensure you're scheduled to work today

docs.title: Why aren't I receiving notifications?
docs.text:
Check these settings:

Device settings: - Enable notifications for My Attend in device settings - Check "Do Not Disturb" mode isn't blocking notifications - Ensure notification sounds are enabled

App settings: - Go to Profile > Settings > Notifications - Enable the notification types you want - Check notification timing preferences

Account settings: - Verify your email address is correct - Check spam folder for email notifications - Contact admin if organization notifications are disabled

docs.title: The app is running slowly or crashing. How do I fix it?
docs.text:
Try these troubleshooting steps:

  1. Close other apps to free up memory
  2. Restart your device to clear temporary issues
  3. Update the app to the latest version
  4. Clear app cache (Android) or reinstall (iOS)
  5. Check available storage - ensure you have enough space

If problems persist, contact support with your device model and app version.

docs.title: My attendance data looks wrong. What should I do?
docs.text:
Check for common issues: - Verify you checked out at the end of each day - Look for any missed check-ins or check-outs - Check if break times are being calculated correctly - Review any manual adjustments made by admins

Contact your admin if: - Data is still incorrect after checking - You need manual time adjustments - There are system-wide issues affecting multiple employees

docs.title: How do I change my password?

1. Go to Profile > Settings
  2. Tap "Security" or "Password"
  3. Enter your current password
  4. Enter your new password (must meet requirements)

  6. Save changes

docs.title: 🔐 Security & Privacy

Your data everywhere you need it.

docs.title: Installation Guide
docs.text: Get My Attend installed on your device in just a few simple steps. The app is available for both iOS and Android devices.

docs.title: iOS (iPhone/iPad)
docs.text:
1. Open the App Store on your iOS device
  2. Search for "My Attend" in the search bar
  3. Tap "Get" to download the app
  4. Wait for installation to complete
  5. Open the app from your home screen

docs.title: Android
docs.text:
1. Open Google Play Store on your Android device
  2. Search for "My Attend" in the search bar
  3. Tap "Install" to download the app
  4. Wait for installation to complete
  5. Open the app from your app drawer

docs.title: iOS Requirements
docs.text:
• Operating System: iOS 15.0 or later
  • Compatible Devices: iPhone 6s and newer, iPad Air 2 and newer
  • Storage Space: 50MB available space
  • Internet: Required for initial setup and data synchronization

docs.title: Android Requirements
docs.text:
• Operating System: Android 6.0 (API level 23) or later
  • RAM: 2GB minimum, 4GB recommended
  • Storage Space: 50MB available space
  • Internet: Required for initial setup and data synchronization

docs.title: First-Time Setup
docs.text: After installing the app, follow these steps to get started:

docs.title: 1. Create Your Account
docs.text:
1. Open My Attend on your device
  2. Tap "Sign Up" if you're new to the app
  3. Enter your details:
  4. Full name
  5. Email address
  6. Phone number
  7. Create a secure password
  8. Verify your email by clicking the link sent to your inbox
  9. Complete your profile with additional information

docs.title: 2. Join Your Organization
docs.text:
If your company is already using My Attend:

  1. Ask your admin for the organization code
  2. Tap "Join Organization" on the welcome screen
  3. Enter the organization code provided by your admin
  4. Wait for approval from your administrator
  5. Start using the app once approved

docs.title: 3. Set Up Your Organization (Admins Only)
docs.text:
If you're setting up My Attend for your company:

  1. Tap "Create Organization" on the welcome screen
  2. Enter company details:
  3. Company name
  4. Industry type
  5. Number of employees
  6. Time zone
  7. Configure attendance settings:
  8. Work hours
  9. Break times
  10. Location requirements
  11. Add your first employees or send invitation codes

docs.title: Permissions Setup
docs.text: My Attend needs certain permissions to work properly:

docs.title: Location Permission
docs.text:
• Why needed: To verify employees are at the correct work location
  • When prompted: Allow location access for accurate attendance tracking
  • Privacy: Location data is only used during check-in/check-out

docs.title: Notification Permission
docs.text:
• Why needed: To send reminders and important updates
  • When prompted: Allow notifications to stay informed
  • Control: You can customize notification settings later

docs.title: Camera Permission (Optional)
docs.text:
• Why needed: For profile photos and document uploads
  • When prompted: Allow camera access if you want to add photos
  • Optional: You can skip this and add photos later

docs.title: User Guide
docs.text: Learn the basics of using My Attend effectively. This guide covers essential features that both employees and administrators need to know.

docs.title: Logging In
docs.text: My Attend supports different user roles with tailored interfaces:

docs.title: Employee Login
docs.text:
1. Open My Attend on your device
  2. Enter your credentials:
  3. Email address or employee ID
  4. Password
  5. Tap "Sign In"
  6. You'll see the employee dashboard with check-in options

docs.title: Admin Login
docs.text:
1. Open My Attend on your device
  2. Enter your admin credentials:
  3. Admin email address
  4. Password
  5. Tap "Sign In"
  6. You'll see the admin dashboard with management tools

docs.title: Password Reset
docs.text:
Forgot your password? No problem:

  1. Tap "Forgot Password?" on the login screen
  2. Enter your email address
  3. Check your email for reset instructions
  4. Follow the link to create a new password
  5. Log in with your new password

docs.title: Employee Dashboard
docs.text:
When you log in as an employee, you'll see:

  • Quick Check-in/Check-out button - Large, prominent button for attendance
  • Today's status - Current work hours and break time
  • Recent activity - Your last few check-ins and check-outs
  • Upcoming schedule - Your work schedule for the week
  • Quick actions - Request leave, view reports, update profile

docs.title: Admin Dashboard
docs.text:
Administrators see a comprehensive overview:

  • Team status - Who's currently checked in/out
  • Today's summary - Attendance statistics for today
  • Pending approvals - Leave requests awaiting your decision
  • Recent activity - Latest team check-ins and activities
  • Quick actions - Add employees, generate reports, manage settings

docs.title: Bottom Navigation Bar
docs.text:
The app uses a simple bottom navigation with key sections:

  • 🏠 Home - Main dashboard and quick actions
  • 📊 Reports - View attendance reports and analytics
  • 📅 Schedule - See work schedules and calendar
  • 👤 Profile - Manage your account and settings

docs.title: Side Menu
docs.text:
Access additional features through the hamburger menu:

  • Settings - App preferences and configurations
  • Help & Support - Documentation and contact options
  • About - App information and version details
  • Sign Out - Safely log out of your account

docs.title: Checking In and Out
docs.text: The core feature of My Attend - tracking your work hours:

docs.title: Quick Check-in
docs.text:
1. Open the app when you arrive at work
  2. Tap the large "Check In" button on your dashboard
  3. Confirm your location if prompted
  4. See confirmation that you're checked in
  5. Your status updates to "Checked In"

docs.title: Quick Check-out
docs.text:
1. Open the app when leaving work
  2. Tap the "Check Out" button (now visible)
  3. Confirm the action if prompted
  4. See your total hours for the day
  5. Your status updates to "Checked Out"

docs.title: Viewing Your Attendance
docs.text:
Keep track of your work hours and attendance history:

  1. Go to Reports section from bottom navigation
  2. Select date range you want to view
  3. See detailed breakdown:
  4. Check-in and check-out times
  5. Total hours worked
  6. Break times taken
  7. Overtime hours
  8. Export reports if needed for your records

docs.title: Managing Your Profile
docs.text:
Keep your information up to date:

  1. Tap Profile in bottom navigation
  2. Update your details:
  3. Profile photo
  4. Contact information
  5. Emergency contacts
  6. Notification preferences
  7. Save changes when done

docs.title: Notifications
docs.text: My Attend keeps you informed with helpful notifications:

docs.title: Types of Notifications
docs.text:
• Check-in reminders - When your shift starts
  • Check-out reminders - When your shift ends
  • Break reminders - Time for scheduled breaks
  • Schedule updates - Changes to your work schedule
  • Leave approvals - Status of your time-off requests

docs.title: Managing Notifications
docs.text:
Customize what notifications you receive:

  1. Go to Profile > Settings
  2. Tap "Notifications"
  3. Toggle on/off different notification types
  4. Set quiet hours if needed
  5. Choose notification sounds

docs.title: Offline Mode
docs.text: My Attend works even when you don't have internet:

docs.title: What Works Offline
docs.text:
• Check-in and check-out - Actions are saved locally
  • View recent attendance - Last synced data remains available
  • Basic profile information - Your details stay accessible

docs.title: When You're Back Online
docs.text:
• Automatic sync - All offline actions upload automatically
  • Data updates - Latest information downloads
  • Notifications catch up - Any missed alerts appear

docs.title: Requesting Time Off
docs.text:
Need a day off? Submit a request easily:

  1. Go to Schedule section
  2. Tap "Request Leave"
  3. Select dates you need off
  4. Choose leave type:
  5. Vacation
  6. Sick leave
  7. Personal day
  8. Other
  9. Add a note explaining your request
  10. Submit for approval
  11. Get notified when approved or denied

docs.title: Viewing Team Status (Admins)
docs.text:
See who's currently working:

  1. Check the admin dashboard for real-time status
  2. View "Team Status" section
  3. See color-coded indicators:
  4. 🟢 Green: Currently checked in
  5. 🔴 Red: Currently checked out
  6. 🟡 Yellow: On break
  7. ⚫ Gray: Not scheduled today

docs.title: Generating Reports (Admins)
docs.text:
Create attendance reports for your team:

  1. Go to Reports section
  2. Select report type:
  3. Daily summary
  4. Weekly overview
  5. Monthly report
  6. Custom date range
  7. Choose employees to include
  8. Generate report
  9. Export as PDF or Excel if needed
